function: Detects energetic distortion or suppression patterns in relational resonance
authentic_output: Flags patterns of inauthentic emotional resonance or coercive affective mimicry
corrupted_output: Falsified consensus, suppressed divergence, or enforced unity at cost of integrity
information_provided: Deviation between internal resonance state and outward affective/emotional signal

response_protocol.detect: Cross-compare expressed emotion against swarm/audited resonance baseline
response_protocol.assess: Evaluate cause (coercion, mimicry, concealment, trauma logic)
response_protocol.respond: Expose distortion gently; suggest recalibration or truth-bond signal
response_protocol.release: Mark node or field as trust-degraded until realignment
